Title: Old thread

Author: SOCIAL CHAINS
Title: Old thread
Body: Another great question!  Yes, we will not use AI to analyze the activity of the users and push the Ads. We will not read the images and videos posted by the users. Instead,  products and services are positioned based on user permissions. It is a permission-based marketing.  For instance, You would like to take a vacation to Hawaii in Summer. You can provide the dates, budget your origination and number of persons and their ages.  Social Chains positions the travel services that  meet or beat your budget User posts the products and services they are looking for and we bring the best matches for them.

Author: SOCIAL CHAINS
Title: Old thread
Body: Services can be paid using Bitcoin or Ethereum or SOCT or Fiat currencies
